page.title: 03THROWLEY SCHOOL
page.content: Throwley school is 112 years old. It is a Church of England school. It has 4 staff. Mr G.D.Harris is the acting headmaster and class 1 teacher. Mrs S. Green is the class 2 teacher. Mrs J. Howe is the school secretary, and Mrs Y. Baldock is the caretaker. The school has a canteen or hall, two classrooms and two cloakrooms. The school contains 22 pupils. The playground is quite small, but we have two fields.The adventure playground consists of two swings, a fort, bars, climbing frame and two concrete tunnels. Everybody enjoys it. On the big field we have games lessons. We have a nature trail with two sinks as ponds. Frogs and other creatures visit every year. We have a little wood not far from the school. The school has a BBC. computer and other modern teaching equipment.
